formula: To represent a number in base b, if a digit exceeds b, subtract b and carry 1. In fractional base a/b, subtract a and carry b.
prog: (Sage)def basepqExpansion(p,q,n):....L=[n]....i=1....while L[i-1]>=p:........x=L[i-1]........L[i-1]=x.mod(p)........L.append(q*floor(x/p))........i+=1....L.reverse()....T=Integer(join([str(x) for x in L],''))....return T[basepqExpansion(6,5,i) for i in [0..100]] # - _Tom Edgar_, _Hailey R. Olafson_, and _James Van Alstine_, Jul 18 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
